title: ELO BOOST REPORT
body:
Hi fellow gamers and RIOT staff,

Just asking where to report player  at service of ELO BOOSTING which break several summoner's code.

I would attach one of the picture here, but I have  stacks of player chat log(picture taken) saying they ARE boosting the account for another party.

Cheers,

replies.body:
Hi there and thanks for the report. I've had to remove the image as reporting others through the forums is against our guidelines listed [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules).

However, if you send in a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) with all the information you've gathered we will have a specialist investigate and take any necessary action.
Smurfing is always going to happen I doubt anyone in league would only have just 1 acc.
